events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it carefully.
Your application has been classified under the Engineering department for further assessment.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application.
We conducted an initial screening of your qualifications and experience relevant to the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening questionnaire. We appreciate your detailed answers.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 18th at 10 AM UTC with the engineering team.
